name: cv2
description: New CV repo following JSON Resume schema

scripts.install: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.start: npm run generate-html && npm run generate-pdf
scripts.push-to-gist: cp resume.json gist; cd gist; git add resume.json; git commit -m 'added changes'; git push; cd -
scripts.deploy: npm run push-to-ghpages && npm run push-to-gist
